Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • MovingImage
            • Hero
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Hero
extends MovingImage
    The Hero class represents the playable main character which can move and use special projectiles. Base code credit: Mr. Shelby
    Version:
    5.6.21
    Author:
    vicram_vijayakumar
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        public Hero(processing.core.PImage img,
            int x,
            int y)
        Creates a new instance of a Hero object having its left corner at the inputed (x, y) coordinates.
        Parameters:
        img - The PImage which the Hero will look like in the game (sprite).
        x - The X value of the Hero's top left corner.
        y - The Y value of the Hero's top left corner.

    • Method Detail

      • addAbility

        public void addAbility(Projectile a)
        Adds a projectile to the Hero's list of projectiles.
        Parameters:
        a - An projectile to add to the Hero's list of projectiles.

      • setDash

        public void setDash(boolean state)
        Sets whether the Hero is able to dash or not.
        Parameters:
        state - The boolean which sets whether the Hero can dash or not.

      • setFacingDirection

        public void setFacingDirection(int x)
        Sets what direction the Hero is facing.
        Parameters:
        x - The facing direction of the Hero.
        Precondition:
        The value of x is either 0 (right) or 180 (less)

      • punch

        public void punch(Enemy e1)
        Deals damage to an enemy by punching it.
        Parameters:
        e1 - The enemy which the Hero deals damage to.
        Precondition:
        The distance from the center of the Hero's x coordinate to the center of the Enemy's x coordinate must be less than 75 to cause damage.

      • walk

        public void walk(int direction)
        Makes the Hero walk depending on the inputed direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction and magnitude which the Hero will move in.

      • jump

        public void jump()
        Makes the Hero jump if the Hero is on a surface.

      • dash

        public void dash()
        Makes the Hero dash depending on the direction which the Hero is facing.

      • getHearts

        public int getHearts()
        Gets the amount of hearts the Hero currently has.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet g)
        Draws the Hero and displays its number of hearts above the Hero.
        Overrides:
        draw in class MovingImage
        Parameters:
        g - The PApplet to draw the Hero and display the text which has the number of hearts the Hero has.

      • act

        public void act(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Shape> platforms,
                Enemy enemy)
        Makes the Hero act by moving, being affected by gravity and friction, and get hurt if attacked by enemy.
        Parameters:
        platforms - The platforms which the hero can stand on and interact with.
        enemy - The enemy which can attack the Hero and cause damage.

      • checkCollision

        public void checkCollision(Enemy e1)
        Makes the Hero lose a heart and jump up if it collides with an enemy.
        Parameters:
        enemy - The enemy which can attack the Hero and cause damage.
